name: Cat-astrophic Burnout: Feline Frenzy
description:
Cats work in a large open space. Nevertheless, cats need a lot of rest. Therefore, if they work too long without a break, they will burn out and block their workstation.

Beware, however, that the number of places on break is limited! And if the company does not produce enough, it will go bankrupt. Too many burnouts will also lead to a closure of the factory...

Learn how to manage this unusual team while producing as much as possible!
